description: Mother of murdered Paul Quinn is calling on Conor Murphy to publicly say her son was not a criminal.
title: Paul Quinn murder: Breege Quinn speaks with Mary Lou McDonald
title_page: Paul Quinn murder: Breege Quinn speaks with Mary Lou McDonald - BBC News
maintext: "I said to Mary Lou, you are the head of Sinn F¨¦in, you are a mother, and if your son's name was blackened, would you fight tooth and nail to clear it, and she said she sure would," said Mrs Quinn.
